description: The web platform was designed to display a catalog of rock and metal albums. For this, data is fetched from a given API. To display them, I used a function that highlights one album as a banner every few records.
The project shows cross-navigation between the album details and the corresponding artist. Within the artist's section, there is also a gallery of albums where users can navigate back to an album.
A local toy store asked me to design their web platform.
The goal was to create an attractive and colorful interface that highlighted the fun and excitement of the toys, making it easy for visitors to explore and purchase products intuitively.

The platform included sections designed to highlight featured products and allow filtering by age and toy type. Products could be filtered for a more efficient browsing experience. Each product had its own detailed page, providing complete information before purchase.

The website was also designed for mobile devices, maintaining the same fun and colorful design across all platforms. It was a project focused on delivering an exceptional user experience, reflecting the joy associated with the world of toys.
This project involved creating a web platform for a product catalog of free choice.
It required creating the database, then loading the products and enabling filtering. Each product had its own dynamically generated detail page.
Additionally, an Administrator section was created with private account login, providing the necessary admin dashboard to add new products, edit them, and track general stock statistics.
This project involved creating an app using the Ionic framework for mobile app development.

It had to be an e-commerce platform with products of choice. For data retrieval, filtering, and search, the Mercado Libre API and its various endpoints were required to achieve the desired functionalities.
It also used a provided API for user registration and authentication for logging in and storing personal user data, as well as for the editable shopping cart and favorite products.
